4‚É£ The #FY22NDAA makes protecting the mental health of service members a priority.

3‚É£ The bill requires the Department of Defense to conduct a thorough and independent review of suicide prevention and response programs at various military installations across America.

2‚É£ The House version of the NDAA also supports a 2.7% pay increase for those who serve the United States in uniform. When we invest in our service members, we‚Äôre investing in America‚Äôs national security.
